CustomField.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Campaign.EV_ProgramaDeEventos__c, '014' ), Campaign.EV_URLEventoVirtualExterno__c != NULL), Campaign.EV_URLEventoVirtualExterno__c, IF(Campaign.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'EV_Eventos_Accionistas', $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlStreamingAccionistaPortal__c , $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.urlStreamingPortal__c )& IF( Campaign.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'EV_Eventos_Accionistas', $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_index__c, $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_Streaming__c ) & IF(ISBLANK(LeadId), IF(ISBLANK(ContactId), IF(ISBLANK(AccountId),'es',CASE(Account.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(Contact.Account.AV_Idioma__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')), CASE(Lead.EV_Idiomas__c, '001', 'ca', '002','es','010','en','es')) & $CustomMetadata.EV_URL_portal__mdt.URLs.URL_param_html__c&'?idEvento=' & Campaign.EV_ExternalID__c & '&idInvitacion='& EV_ExternalID__c )
CustomField.label: URL streaming de evento
